plot: Nozomu tries to teach students gently, because he doesn't want to push them too hard. He later develops an addiction for dramatic situations and tries to understand a trend for doing things backwards.
title: "Zoku sayonara zetsubô sensei" Chakuriku no Sakae/Aru Onna Yaku/Nami ni Nottekuru Pororokka
plot_es: Nozomu tries to teach students gently, because he doesn't want to push them too hard. He later develops an addiction for dramatic situations and tries to understand a trend for doing things backwards.
original_name: "Zoku sayonara zetsubô sensei" Chakuriku no Sakae/Aru Onna Yaku/Nami ni Nottekuru Pororokka
